services.features: Component libraries, tokens, style guides, documentation.

About.title: About me
About.content:
Iâ€™m a front-end developer and UI/UX designer focused on crafting digital experiences that feel intuitive and human. 

 I care deeply about details, performance, and the invisible interactions that make people enjoy using a product. 

 My work combines creativity and logic â€” blending thoughtful design with clean, maintainable code. I believe that good design is not only about aesthetics but about how it makes people feel and move through an interface. 

 Each project is an opportunity to create something meaningful, functional, and lasting â€” a bridge between technology and emotion.
